metadata.title: CVE-2020-35680 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: smtpd/lka_filter.c in OpenSMTPD before 6.8.0p1, in certain configurations, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) via a crafted pattern of client activity, because the filter state machine does not properly maintain the I/O channel between the SMTP engine and the filters layer.

criterions.comment: opensmtpd package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
